summary: Comprehensive testing of Electronic Contract Signature System for Academia Jotuns completed. Backend APIs are fully functional with 100% success rate. Frontend navigation and public signing portal are working correctly with proper design compliance.

ui_bugs.issue: Error message not displayed for invalid login attempts

design_issues.issue: JOTUNS logo properly displayed with corporate branding
Corporate color #002D54 correctly implemented throughout the system

passed_tests: All 25 backend API endpoints working correctly
Dashboard metrics display (contracts, requests, pending, signed)
Navigation between all admin pages (Dashboard, Contracts, Signature Requests, Audit Logs, Verify Integrity)
Public signing portal loads correctly with proper branding
OTP verification step displays with security features
SHA-256 hash calculation and verification working
Audit logs capture and display correctly
Data-testid attributes present for automated testing

success_percentage.frontend: 95% - Minor error handling issue with login form

action_item_for_main_agent: Minor fix needed: Add proper error message display for invalid login attempts in AdminLogin component. All other functionality is working correctly.
